IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.complete_quest') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.complete_quest GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.complete_quest @character_id dbo.id_t, @quest_code dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION DELETE FROM dbo.Accept_Quest_Missions WHERE character_id = @character_id AND quest_code = @quest_code DELETE FROM dbo.Accept_Quests WHERE character_id = @character_id AND quest_code = @quest_code INSERT INTO dbo.Complete_Quests(character_id, quest_code) VALUES (@character_id, @quest_code) COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.complete_quest') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.complete_quest GO
